content.question: Which of the following best describes patriarchal gender systems?

choices.label: Women are not allowed to work.
Women are confined to the home.
Women can be bought and sold.
Women are inferiors and must be protected by men.
Women are not allowed by men to serve as political rulers.

content.answer: Women are inferiors and must be protected by men.
